org.sindice.siren.analysis.filter

Class URINormalisationFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.util.AttributeSource
      • org.apache.lucene.analysis.TokenStream
        • org.apache.lucene.analysis.TokenFilter
          • org.sindice.siren.analysis.filter.URINormalisationFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class URINormalisationFilter
extends org.apache.lucene.analysis.TokenFilter
    Break an URI into smaller components based on delimiters, such as ':', '/', etc. and uppercase.

    This filter is very demanding in term of CPU. In general, when this filter is used, the parsing time for a set of tuples doubles. If you don't need it, removed it from your token stream.
